document.full_text: boston bruins rookie tyler seguin scored a pair of goals and set up two others in a 6-5 win over the tampa bay lightning on tuesday to level the nhl eastern conference finals at 1-1.
document.title: rookie seguin inspires bruins to game two win
lines_and_colors: boston bruins rookie tyler seguin scored a pair of goals and set up two others in a 6-5 win over the tampa bay lightning on tuesday to level the nhl eastern conference finals at 1-1.
